entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 late in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
